citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on
06/23/2015.
Inspectors honked the horn and knocked on the door and waited in the driveway.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
